cons: Persimmon contains a good amount of tannin. Hence, if this fruit is taken in empty stomach, it results in diarrhea. It should also be consumed in a limited quantity.
The sugar content of this fruit is really high and hence, those, who suffer from diabetes, should stay away from this fruit.
description: Persimmon maintains the blood pressure and keep cardiovascular system healthy.
name: Persimmon
pros: Persimmon maintains the blood pressure and keep cardiovascular system healthy.
It is safe to eat persimmon but pregnant women must limit amount of consumption.
The high potassium content of this fruit acts as a vasodilator and thereby increases the blood flow throughout the body. Thus, the blood pressure reduces.
